title: Nutella Chocolate Pudding Recipe
full_text:
Nutella Chocolate Pudding Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Cook
10 mins
Active
15 mins
Chilling Time
3 hrs
Total
3 hrs 10 mins
Serves
4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
3
tablespoons
cornstarch
3
tablespoons
granulated sugar
2
tablespoons
cocoa
Pinch
salt
2
cups
milk
4
ounces
bittersweet chocolate
, finely chopped
1/2
cup
plus
1
tablespoon
Nutella
1
tablespoon
unsalted butter
1
teaspoon
vanilla extract
Directions
Stir cornstarch, sugar, cocoa, and salt in medium bowl. Heat milk in medium saucepan over medium heat until scalding. Whisk half of milk into cornstarch mixture. Return mixture to pan and cook, stirring, until mixture thickens and comes to boil.
Remove from heat and stir in chocolate, Nutella, butter, and vanilla. Chill until set, about 3 hours.
Custards, Mousses & Puddings
Chocolate
